thread.title: HP shutters Helion Public Cloud six months after saying it wouldnt
thread.title_full: HP shutters Helion Public Cloud six months after saying it wouldnt

title: HP shutters Helion Public Cloud six months after saying it wouldnt
text:
HP shutters Helion Public Cloud six months after saying it wouldn't 
The Inquirer Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
a dramatic U-turn on its public cloud offering, just a week before the company splits in two. 
The Helion Public Cloud will be "sunsetted" in January 2016 after failing to keep up with rivals such as Amazon Web Services (AWS). 
But Helion product management SVP...
